name: Sleep Cvlt Tapes
description: Sleep Cvlt Tapes is a fun & simple retro style game. To play, you must keep collecting tapes, & boost your Cassette character, higher & higher ! If you miss a tape, it decreases your boost power & increases your chances of falling back to game over. Tip: When falling down try to move towards a tape to save yourself. Unlock, additional Cassette Tape, character colors, with high scores. Compete, worldwide using the Game Center leaderboard.
